OOC: Please keep in mind that radio/video communications from the battle
fi=
eld around the Black Tower have been severed for the Maximals and
Autobots.=
 Those at the Ark however are free to communicate with each other
if they c=
hoose.

Preston


On Fri, Jan 21, 2011 at 2:47 PM, Super Cyclonus <supercyc=
lonus@...>wrote:

> *Near to the Black Tower:*
>
> As Tuscon and the =
rest lay down their weapons, the other soldiers move to
> encircle the Maxi=
mals and the Autobots. Insecticon, Bruticus-X, and Iguanus
> moved in almos=
t eagerly to pick up the mighty weapons that Tuscon has
> dropped, while In=
ferno, the self proclaimed bodyguard of Hydras watched
> Tuscon carefully, =
his optic ready to spot treachery.
>
> Quietly a short message is sent to T=
uscon, =93Tuscon.=94 The deep voice of
> Noctorro, the leader of the Maxima=
l Fuzors can be heard, =93My team is here.
> Rodimus sent us to aid you. No=
ne too soon it would seem.=94 Noctorro=92s words
> are grim, a soldier=92s =
humor in them. =93We await your signal.=94
>
> At the same time Injector, B=
uzzclaw, Terrorgator, and Quickstrike move to
> do the same with Kup, Night=
shift, Straightshot, Talon and the others.
> Skyshadow, the leader of the P=
redacon Fuzors just watches with a gloating
> look on his face, it is almos=
t as if he wants them to attack and keep the
> battle going.
>
> Meanwhile =
Phobia and several sweeps keep an eye on things from the air,
> while Terro=
rsaur and Waspinator landed, ready to help out as needed.
>
> At the same t=
ime Legacy processed Tuscon=92s command for him to leave the
> Ark. There w=
as a long pause, and then the temporal guardian=92s cold voice
> comes acro=
ss the channel, =93I will not comply with your command. I have been
> taske=
d with the . . . >*BZZZTT!*<
>
> Deepstryke transmits to Hydras, =93Hydras.=
 I am picking up an encrypted
> transmissions to and from Tuscon, he is att=
empting to communicate with the
> others. I am generating a radio dampening=
 field now in this area. Only the
> Predacons will be able to transmit.=94
=
>
>
> *Meanwhile inside the Black Tower:*
>
> Windlord=92s attempt to open =
fire on the Scourge was met with a measure of
> futility. Scourge just step=
ped away from the opening that Windlord fired out
> from and let the shots =
go harmlessly into a bulkhead, scorching it only
> slightly.
>
> However th=
at slight amount of time allowed Windlord and Rat Trap time to
> scurry fur=
ther into their crawl space and find an interior bulkhead to hide
> behind.=

>
> =93Scrap!=94 Scourge=92s voice said from the outside. There was a paus=
e and then,
> =93Cyclonus, they have fled into the walls.=94
>
> There was =
another pause, and then Scourge chuckled, =93Of course. I will be
> ready f=
or them.=94
>
> From further inside the crawl space the sounds of chitterin=
g could be
> heard, and then several groups of optics could be seen in the =
distance
> coming towards Rat Trap and Windlord. In the darkness their shap=
es could
> only be barely made out, but they looked like black metallic spi=
ders,
> Hydras=92 wall guardians!
>
> (OOC: Rat Trap may recognize them fro=
m last time. Also keep in mind that
> Rat Trap and Windlord should be in be=
ast mode. They would have to be to fit
> inside the crawl space. In the too=
n the Beast Modes did not have offensive
> weaponry, except for teeth and c=
laws)
>
> *Outside the Ark:*
>
> Rodimus was positioned in a small grove of=
 trees, ducking down behind
> several large rocks. He gives Quickstride a q=
uizzical look as the equine
> Maximal sniffed him.
>
> (OOC: Quickstride=92=
s sniff reveals nothing wrong.)
>
> He was about to let Quickstride in on w=
hat he had planned when Uproar
> appeared. Rodimus appears taken aback thou=
gh by Uproar=92s conclusion that it
> was Legacy that had turned evil. Whil=
e Rodimus didn=92t know that much about
> Legacy, having only seen him brie=
fly while being rescued and repaired, there
> was nothing to hint that this=
 attack was Legacy=92s doing. He was about to say
> something when Uproar r=
an towards the Ark to be let in . . .
>
> >KRACK POW<
>
> As Uproar ran tow=
ards the Ark, what seemed like a round bolt of lightening
> appeared, sendi=
ng Uproar flying several yards through the air, to land
> heavily on the gr=
ound! Evidently the Ark shielding was still in place, and
> it was not allo=
wing anyone in.
>
> Rodimus frowned, =93Uproar! Get over here! If we are go=
ing to get back in,
> then we need to work together. That shield is suppose=
d to hold off all the
> Predacon forces. We are not going to get in by brut=
e force.=94
>
> As Rodimus talked three other Maximals seemed to almost mat=
erialize out of
> the underbrush, such was their skills at camouflage.
>
> =
The first was Wing Caliber, (See: http://tfwiki.net/wiki/Skywarp ) an old
>=
 Maximal stratagist and military teacher, who from the brownish feathers
> =
along his frame turned into some sort of eagle.
>
> The next was Leo II, (
=
> http://en.academic.ru/pictures/enwiki/76/Lioconvoy_gathering.jpg ) the
> =
adopted son of Lio Convoy, and who looked much like him, and who had
> obvi=
ously picked up many of his mannerisms. His body was powerfully built
> and=
 heavily armored. He looked to turn into a lion.
>
> The third was Ramulus =
(http://tfwiki.net/wiki/Ramulus) who had like the
> others been on patrol f=
or a while, surveying the area and trying to keep it
> free from Predacon i=
nvasion.
>
> They also come up beside Rodimus, Leo II, obviously the leader=
 of the other
> two, =93What now sir?=94
>
> Rodimus looked at Quickstride =
and Uproar, =93Well let=92s get out of sight, and
> then we can discuss it.=
=94
>
> *Meanwhile Inside the Ark:*
>
> Perceptor had received Tuscon=92s m=
essage and sent attempted to send a
> message to Lord elder, however at the=
 moment there was no answer from the
> elder Maximal.
>
> At the same time =
Legacy was still standing in the med lab along with the
> others, his singl=
e optic glowing in the darkness.
>
> =93It would seem that Nightlight=92s v=
ital systems are being held at minimal
> levels.=94 Legacy said as he direc=
ted his gaze to the wall panel nearest
> Nightlight. A small light blinked,=
 indicating her spark was still online,
> but that there was not enough pow=
er to reboot her systems.
>
> He turned to look at the others, his face glo=
wing in the darkness, lit by
> his own optic, and the glowing bar on his ch=
est plate. He raised his right
> hand in the air, the one with the arm cann=
on on it and begin to emit light
> from it, much like a flash light or a be=
acon so that the room was
> illuminated. He casually looked around, =93Perh=
aps we could locate a back out
> or reserve power system . . . =93
>
> Lega=
cy paused as Tuscon=92s message came in. He turned to look at Santon,
> Bum=
p and Perceptor, a look of disbelief momentarily flashing across his
> face=
.
>
> Legacy straightened as his cold voice comes across the channel, =93I =
will not
> comply with your command. I have been tasked with  . . . . >*BZZ=
ZTT!*<  . .
> . the protection of the Ark as well as that of the Matrix. I =
will not
> knowingly leave the Ark undefended or the Matrix in the hands of=
 another.=94
>
> Legacy turned to look at his console as he understoodf wha=
t happened.
> Communications had been cut part way through his message. He =
turned to look
> at the others, his single optic cold, =93It is illogical t=
o believe that I
> would attempt to harm the Ark or allow anyone to take it=
 from the Maximals.=94
>
> (TAG)
>
> Preston
>
>

<div>OOC: Please keep in mind that radio/video communications from the batt=
le field around the Black Tower have been severed for the Maximals and Auto=
bots. Those at the Ark however are free to communicate with each other if t=
hey choose. </div>

<div>=A0</div>
<div>Preston</div>
<div><br>=A0</div>

<div><=
font face=3D"comic sans ms,sans-serif">Meanwhile Phobia and several sweeps =

rk. There was a long pause, and then the temporal guardian=92s cold voice c=
omes across the channel, =93I will not comply with your command. I have bee=
n tasked with the . . . >*BZZZTT!*<</font></div>

comic sans ms,sans-serif">=A0</font></div>
<div><font face=3D"comic sans ms=

 Only the Predacons will be able to transmit.=94</font></div>

if">=A0</font></div>

now that much about Legacy, having only seen him briefly while being rescue=

oing. He was about to say something when Uproar ran towards the Ark to be l=

/font></div>

div>

flying several yards through the air, to land heavily on the ground! Eviden=
tly the Ark shielding was still in place, and it was not allowing anyone in=
.</font></div>

<div><font face=3D"comic sans ms,sans-serif">=A0</font></di=
v>

 Get over here! If we are going to get back in, then we need to work togeth=

serif">As Rodimus talked three other Maximals seemed to almost materialize =

ywarp</a> ) an old Maximal stratagist and military teacher, who from the br=
ownish feathers along his frame turned into some sort of eagle. =A0</font><=
/div>

<div><=
font face=3D"comic sans ms,sans-serif">The next was Leo II, (<a href=3D"htt=

) the adopted son of Lio Convoy, and who looked much like him, and who had =
obviously picked up many of his mannerisms. His body was powerfully built a=

<div><=

<div><font face=3D"=
comic sans ms,sans-serif">The third was Ramulus (<a href=3D"http://tfwiki.n=
et/wiki/Ramulus" target=3D"_blank">http://tfwiki.net/wiki/Ramulus</a>) who =
had like the others been on patrol for a while, surveying the area and tryi=
ng to keep it free from Predacon invasion.</font></div>

s,sans-serif">They also come up beside Rodimus, Leo II, obviously the leade=

s ms,sans-serif">At the same time Legacy was still standing in the med lab =

v>

 face=3D"comic sans ms,sans-serif">=93It would seem that Nightlight=92s vit=

o look at the others, his face glowing in the darkness, lit by his own opti=
